SELECT GBCODE, GBMID, GBTITLE, GBCONTENTS, TO_CHAR(GBDATE, 'MM-DD') GBDATE, GBIMG, GBSTATE, GBHITS, GBNICKNAME, GBFIX FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, ADMIN_GBLIST_VIEW.* FROM ADMIN_GBLIST_VIEW
WHERE
(GBTITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR GBCONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
${searchType} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND
GBSTATE=1
GBSTATE=2
) WHERE RN BETWEEN ${startRow} AND ${endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GONGUBOARDS (GBCODE, GBMID, GBTITLE, GBCONTENTS, GBDATE, GBIMG, GBITEMNAME, GBITEMPRICE) VALUES (#{gbcode}, #{gbmid}, #{gbtitle}, #{gbcontents}, SYSDATE, #{gbimg}, #{gbitemname}, #{gbitemprice})
mapper.update: UPDATE GONGUBOARDS SET GBTITLE=#{gbtitle}, GBCONTENTS=#{gbcontents}, GBIMG=#{gbimg}, GBITEMNAME=#{gbitemname}, GBITEMPRICE=#{gbitemprice} WHERE GBCODE=#{gbcode}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GONGUBOARDS WHERE GBFIX != 1
AND
(GBTITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR GBCONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
${searchType} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT GBCODE,GBMID,GBTITLE,GBCONTENTS,TO_CHAR(GBDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS GBDATE, GBIMG,GBITEMNAME,GBITEMPRICE,GBSTATE,GBHITS,MB.MNICKNAME AS GBNICKNAME, GBFIX FROM GONGUBOARDS GB, MEMBERS MB WHERE GBCODE = #{gbcode} AND GB.GBMID = MB.MID
